data.description:
Song Beater is a VR rhythm/fitness game on steroids. Beat 60+ included songs and videos (or add your own) with your bare fists in Fit Boxing mode (singleplayer and multiplayer), wield variety of weapons (blades, tonfas, phasers, staff, saw) in Free Style or dominate the playfield in Real 360 mode. Global and friends leaderboards, achievements, calories burnt statistics. Custom songs and videos support.

- 6 game modes, singleplayer and multiplayer with voice-chat
- 8 game environments (Space, Dark Island, Ancient Egypt, Early Access theme, Flying Dragon, Winter, Deep Ocean, The Club)
- 5 difficulty levels (light, gentle, normal, intense and... impossible)
- 30 achievements
- Family party mode; Song speed settings (90-150%), one-hand and no-fail options; Color customizations; Several types of laser obstacles, stationary and moving; Level editor available

changelog.change_log: Experimental 120 fps support (requires Quest 2 on v28 firmware) â€“ hold your right trigger for 5 seconds in main menu of Song Beater, fps indicator will appear and framerate is set to 120 (if available; also consider lowering graphic settings to medium or low if needed). Hold for 5 seconds again if you want to disable it and revert to 90/72 fps. Bugfixes: custom video songs should display correct length
Improvements and bugfixes (staff weapon will switch between hands only when both hands are close enough; head and hand collisions vs obstacles active again; real 360 mode with insta shock setting)
